about_the_game:
Exostation is a sci-fi real-time strategy game. Reach sustainable planet economies by building, allocating, mining, and selling wisely. Allow humanity to spread and conquer new solar systems not by war but by ensuring its planet's resources are not exhausted.

Help humanity become a multi-planetary species


Earth is not the only planet humanity can live on anymore. A multi-planetary species means new planets to discover and develop.
As a space explorer, you will explore new solar systems, it will be your responsibility to build each planet's economy. Sustainability is the key!

Build Exostations on new worlds


Before growing the population of a new planet, fulfilling their basic needs is required. You will have to ensure there is enough food and water to feed them and enough shelter for them to survive. Build farms, water pumps, and housing.

Trade goods with other planets to develop further


To become sustainable, exchanging goods with other planets is necessary. Extract metals by building mines, transform them into goods in your factories and sell those via your market. You will then obtain more money to develop.

Be mindful of your actions


Choose where you will build your next farm or mine carefully, and leverage the placement bonuses to get the best results.
